attributes.additional_details:
Baseline is a creative studio in the heart of Blackpool, and is a vital cog in Blackpool's thriving art scene.
They were promised 4 more years in the studio, (which is being used to provide art lessons for teens, allowing exhibitions, and promoting local business) however, they have (today 14/11/14) been told that they have one week to vacate the premises.
This is a crying shame, and a major blow to many residents in Blackpool.
I urge Mr Ed Vaizey to look into this matter.
